object.name: talk
object.property: <model xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="type_of_talk_" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Type of talk”</title> <values> <element>talk</element> <element>keynote</element> <element>training</element> <element></element> </values> </field> <field name="details" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <max_length>2000</max_length> <required>False</required> <title>Details</title> </field> <field name="audience" type="zope.schema.Set"> <default/> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Audience</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>beginner</element> <element>advanced</element> <element>pro</element> <element></element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="speaker" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Speaker</title> </field> <field name="email" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Email</title> </field> <field name="image" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>image</title> </field> <field name="speaker_biography" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Speaker Biography</title> </field> </schema> </model>
